title: Mainstay's Kudla Favors Tech in a Rate Hike Environment (Audio)
itunes:title: Mainstay's Kudla Favors Tech in a Rate Hike Environment (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: David Kudla, CEO and Chief Investment Strategist of Mainstay Capital Management, on the market reaction to Yellen speech, and where he is seeing value.
